item.title: 【Helpdesk】Help/Tutorial with removing DRM protection from music videos on Apple Music
item.description:
I have recently subscribed to Apple Music and would like to know if there is a way of removing the DRM protection from the M4V's (music videos) please?
All I would like it for is for the music videos specifically.
I have followed a few guides from the HelpDesk section to no avail. I installed older versions of iTunes and TunesKit and M4VGear, but to no avail.
Any help would be appreciated!
item.author: Krafty K

item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Carl Orff - Carmina Burana
item.description:
Requesting "Carmina Burana" by Carl Orff and Michael Plasson. Preferably FLAC.

https://www.qobuz.com/gb-en/album/orff-carmina-burana-michel-plasson/0724355539250

Thanks!
item.author: us1273
